name: Cognixia
description: Cognixia is a digital transformation partner with a focus on future-proofing the modern workforce. With Rewire by Cognixia - the revolutionary learning platform delivering customized training and specialized certifications - and JUMP by Cognixia - the hire, train, deploy program focused on delivering digitally native talent - Cognixia will guide you through your digital transformation and beyond. Since 2014, over 130,000 people across 45 countries have been trained in digital technologies by Cognixia’s team. Whether it’s upgrading your workforce in tomorrow’s technologies, delivering digital-ready talent to hire, or building a digital transformation roadmap for your business, Cognixia can help you get ahead of the technology curve. Our team of more than 7000 industry experts facilitates more than 450 comprehensive digital technologies courses, along with state-of-the-art infrastructure, to deliver the best learning experience for everyone.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: World's leading Digital Talent Transformation Partner
ShortDescription: Cognixia is a digital transformation partner with a focus on future-proofing the modern workforce.
enhanced_description: Cognixia positions itself as a world-leading Digital Talent Transformation Partner, dedicated to future-proofing the modern workforce through comprehensive digital transformation initiatives. The company offers two core programs: Rewire by Cognixia, a revolutionary learning platform providing customized training and specialized certifications, and JUMP by Cognixia, a hire, train, deploy program designed to deliver digitally native talent. Since its launch in 2014, Cognixia has successfully trained over 130,000 individuals across 45 countries in various digital technologies. With a vast team of more than 7,000 industry experts and a catalog of over 450 comprehensive digital technologies courses, supported by state-of-the-art infrastructure, Cognixia focuses on accelerating skill development, boosting productivity and growth, and fostering a culture of innovation to help businesses get ahead of the technology curve.
